As good as it gets.  Truly exceptional meal.Walked in with no reservation, scanned a very small menu and struggled to communicate with the owner about having a vegetarian meal prepared.  She was welcoming, accommodating, and earnest in her efforts to assure me that I would be taken care of.Artsy and eclectic in decor, the design was original and surprisingly homey.  We were completely blown away by our meal.  Boyfriend went with a tasting menu and was served an exquisite sample of starters so lovely in presentation.  From a variety of octopus, melting brie, shrimp and a variety of other starters, each portion was, what he calls, "Iron chef-like."  His fishbone collar was the best piece of cooked fish he has eaten (he prefers sushi) and the black and white dessert was so perfect and decadent.I enjoyed a beautiful dish of black rice with vegetables and a parmesan broth.  It was rich, nutty, perfectly cooked, and unlike anything I have ever had.  We loved everything about this meal:  the service, the food, the wine, the plating, the dessert and simply the surprise of it all-- it amazes me that their prices were so affordable.  Unforgettable meal, we are eager to return!
